name: Darkness Among Us
description:
⦁ ⦁ ⦁ ⦁ ⦁ ⦁

THEME OF THE GAME

-SANITY IS YOUR SUPER POWER-

╭━━ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ━━╮

Hey, glad to see you're playing our game!

First, appreciate that. We want to introduce ourselves and our group. We are two game developers that found a studio named Klockmaker, and we are university degree 1 students in the department of digital game design. We are working together since 1 year.

In addition, we started this game for Magara Jam #4, and worked on it nearly 55 hours to make it reach this level. Please play till the end to see it's full capacity. We want to complete this game to full version and publish it on Steam, and we'll be still working on it after jam.

Doğaç Ekin Metin - 3D Designer

Ahmet İhsan Budak - Developer and 2D Designer

KLOCKMAKER STUDIO

╰━━ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ━━╯

CONTROL SCHEME

F - Activate-Deactivate Light Ability

C - Crouch (Toggle)

SPACE - Jump

E - Interact

Don't Worry, all of these are shown in the tutorial chapters!

╭━━ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ━━╮

Assets that used from Internet:

Forest Pack - Character Model -Butcher Model

Doctor Doom Model - Doctor Plague Model

Jasminium Model - Styslized Bush Model

Warehouse Models -  Almirah Model

Horror Pack (For only 1 model)

Some of the Materials:
